name: Santa Giftrun
description:
Must Read
There is a big chance the game won't work properly or not work at all on pretty much any browser except Firefox. If you don't use Firefox I advise downloading the EXE file from bellow.
Introduction
Santa Giftrun is the game I made for Discord Game Jam #3 in 2 days. It's a side scroller where you have to help Santa deliver gifts in time for everybody.
How to play
The controls are standard. You either choose SPACE and WASD or SPACE and ARROW KEYS. Space is used for dropping gifts, while the others are used for moving. Enjoy!
Credits
Everything except the music was made by me. The awesome music in the background is made by Fatal Exit. Have a look. He's really good.
